content: Bad experience  Don’t trust the landload compeletely. Before getting the key and clean house, don’t pay anything.  Confirm which room, which floor.  Check the door, make sure it won’t be locked by itself. Make sure the time to moving the luggage, be clear at which day and hour.  If it changes, remind what was discussed before and ask why. Confirm 10 minutes early if it is not clear at time.  For the urgent case, make a call, don’t believe the messages.  Future alarm  Check the staff:  washing machine, dry machine air condition   先小人，后君子
summary: Bad experience  Don’t trust the landload compeletely. Before getting the key and clean house, don’t pay anything.  Confirm which room, which floor.  Check the door, make sure it won’t be locked by itself. Make sure the time to moving the luggage, be clear at which day and hour.  If it changes, remind what was discussed before and ask why. Confirm 10 minutes early if it is not clear at time.
title: Consideration before Rental

content:
Plugins After Install Chrome as the Browser, there are some step for plugins.
Go to Chrome web store and search:
 Android Emulator Emulate Android App Grammarly Fix grammar problems AdGuard Block ads when watching movies  Bookmarks There are many useful online tools’ websites. Add them in the bookmarks:
Program  Web Server 000webhost provides 1 GB free space for server. Just put index.html in the folder public_html Host Domain TK offers free host name for 1 year. It includes .tk .ml .ga .cf .gq Picture Source A.Photo Store pictures for using in websites  Academic  Online Latex Overleaf Write the thesis online Online Draw Draw Graph for UML, Entity Relation, etc.  Amusement  MP3 Convert Flvto Convert Youtube video into MP3, then Downloads Free
summary:
Plugins After Install Chrome as the Browser, there are some step for plugins.
Go to Chrome web store and search:
 Android Emulator Emulate Android App Grammarly Fix grammar problems AdGuard Block ads when watching movies  Bookmarks There are many useful online tools’ websites. Add them in the bookmarks:
Program  Web Server 000webhost provides 1 GB free space for server. Just put index.html in the folder public_html Host Domain TK offers free host name for 1 year.

content:
邻居家小孩都馋哭了系列 所谓在家靠父母，出门吃饭还是自己做便宜。外面的菜太贵了，忒贵了，老贵了，自己做点，吃的时候要记得看着《风味人间》！
京酱肉丝  准备好肉，甜面酱，豆瓣酱，葱，姜，老抽，淀粉 处理材料  水淀粉中淀粉要少，显得水有点浑就行 肉的精瘦部分切成丝，和水淀粉放在一块，肥的部分剁一剁，放在碗里备用 葱、姜切成丁  肥肉下锅，中火熬（很长一段时间）油， 然后放葱姜炒出香味 一定要开大火，将肉和水淀粉放在锅里翻炒 待至七成熟，放入2勺甜面酱，1勺豆瓣酱，加一点点老抽染色，翻炒至尝一口觉得还行，就可以盛出来了        青椒肉丝  准备好肉，葱，姜，菜椒，老抽，淀粉 处理材料  水淀粉中淀粉要少，显得水有点浑就行 肉的精瘦部分切成丝，和水淀粉放在一块，肥的部分剁一剁，放在碗里备用 葱切成丁，菜椒切成丝  肥肉下锅，中火熬（很长一段时间）油， 然后放葱姜炒出香味 一定要开大火，将肉和水淀粉放在锅里翻炒 待至七成熟，加一点点老抽染色，放入菜椒丝，翻炒至尝一口觉得还行，就可以盛出来了 如果有隔天剩的米饭，而且还想吃个炒鸡蛋的话，就勇敢地去做吧，好吃的菜百搭        家庭专用火锅 准备材料：香菇 泡面 白菜 羊肉 酒

吃完肉后，喝一杯浓茶帮助消化，人生极大乐事
summary:

吃完肉后，喝一杯浓茶帮助消化，人生极大乐事

content: Standards:  Just focus on the words what we use most in chatting: Compared with our own language, habit, culture, self-introduce Be postive to talk with native speakers: Language is used to let other undersand us  200 words Conjonction    Words Meaning Words Meaning Words Meaning Words Meaning     et and ou or autre other d’abord first     mais but peut-être maybe ensuite then   aussi also toutefois however si if donc therefore   moi aussi me too pas moi not me même same alors so, then    Verbe    Words Meaning Example  Words Meaning Example     être to be Êtes-vous marié?  aller to go Où vas-tu?   avoir to have Il a une petite voiture.  venir to come Je viens de Chine   habiter to live Ma famille n’habite pas ici.  s’appeler to be named Comment t’appelles-tu?   étudier to study Qu’est-que tu étudies?
summary: Standards:  Just focus on the words what we use most in chatting: Compared with our own language, habit, culture, self-introduce Be postive to talk with native speakers: Language is used to let other undersand us  200 words Conjonction    Words Meaning Words Meaning Words Meaning Words Meaning     et and ou or autre other d’abord first     mais but peut-être maybe ensuite then   aussi also toutefois however si if donc therefore   moi aussi me too pas moi not me même same alors so, then    Verbe    Words Meaning Example  Words Meaning Example     être to be Êtes-vous marié?
title: French Learn Tips

content:
Overview Update website Using Hugo to set personal website has some issues about Git to attention. Source code and website code are independent.
   Category Source code Website Code     Creation Manually Automatically   File type .md .html   Usage Edit the Content Display the Information   Folder hugo root public    Therefore, we need to develop the source code firstly, and push it to git. Then, refresh the public folder to update the blog website. The steps are as follows.
 Git push Blog source Create public folder Operate the following commands:  cd public git clone https://github.com/:github_account/:git_repository ./ cd .. hugo cd public git add . git commit -m 'update blog' git push
summary:
Overview Update website Using Hugo to set personal website has some issues about Git to attention. Source code and website code are independent.
   Category Source code Website Code     Creation Manually Automatically   File type .md .html   Usage Edit the Content Display the Information   Folder hugo root public    Therefore, we need to develop the source code firstly, and push it to git.
title: Git Commands in Usage

content: Create the dynamic picture  导入图片 File -> 设置图片大小（宽500px） 打开时间轴控件 逆向并设置时间 设置过度（每张1秒，间隔20张） 存储为网页可识别
summary: Create the dynamic picture  导入图片 File -> 设置图片大小（宽500px） 打开时间轴控件 逆向并设置时间 设置过度（每张1秒，间隔20张） 存储为网页可识别
title: Photoshop Tips

content:
After Install Atom as the Editor, there are some tips.
Hot Key The list is shown in File -> Settings -> Keybindings. Some of them are used frequently.
 Ctrl-Shift-F Find in the whole project Ctrl-Shift-M Preview Ctrl-Comma Settings  Plugins There are some necessary plugins which can help write the code. Instal them accross File -> Settings
 Preview Go to Packages and disable mark-preview, then, go to Install and search mark-preview-plus Tool-Bar Search it by tool-bar-markdown-writer, it will need the dependency, include tool-bar and markdown-writer, the system will promt. Language Search it by language-markdown Table Search it by markdown-table-editor
summary:
After Install Atom as the Editor, there are some tips.
Hot Key The list is shown in File -> Settings -> Keybindings. Some of them are used frequently.
 Ctrl-Shift-F Find in the whole project Ctrl-Shift-M Preview Ctrl-Comma Settings  Plugins There are some necessary plugins which can help write the code. Instal them accross File -> Settings
 Preview Go to Packages and disable mark-preview, then, go to Install and search mark-preview-plus Tool-Bar Search it by tool-bar-markdown-writer, it will need the dependency, include tool-bar and markdown-writer, the system will promt.
